title: How Twitter could help police predict hate crimes in the UK
text:
British police could soon use Minority Report-style algorithms to predict and prevent hate crimes before they happen.

That's according to researchers at Cardiff University who have developed an AI that can anticipate real-world violence based on hateful comments made on Twitter.

The AI was created by the University's HateLab project, which collected data from Twitter and crime data from London between August 2013 and August 2014
